page.title: 18OUR HOUSE
page.content:
Our house is a semi-detached house.It has five bedrooms,a lounge,a utility room,a living room and a dining room. Our house has 21 windows and 12 doors. In my room I have a bed,a wardrobe,a set of drawers and a drawer where I put my things.In my sister's room there is a bunk bed,a wardrobe,a set of drawers and a bedding box to put all her toys in.In our lounge we have a television,a stereo unit and a big glass cabinet where all the records go.Our bathroom has a shower,a toilet and a carpet.Our utility room has a washer,a wash-basin, a bowl and a linen-basket.
{(DESCRIPTION WRITTEN BY SHARON BAXTER, {AGED 11.) }
